name: Billi's Ventures
description:
Billi's Ventures is a game made for 7DRL Challenge 2023 Game jam made in 5 days.

In this game you play as Billi defending from creatures and gathering items along the way. Your goal is to survive 5 minutes against this horde.

Note: This game is HEAVILY inspired by Vampire Survivors

Controls:

Right Click - Moves Billi to target location

Left Click - Makes Billi shoot peas at target location

Rougelike elements:

-Perma Death

-Procedural Generation(Currently implemented as form of item picking but can be expanded on room generation in future)

Plans for future: Making this into a retro style game that can be easily implemented into a web page and adding way more items including items that aren't only stat items. Couldn't work anymore at this time due to work.
